subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Hugh Jessiman, the 12th pick of the 2003 draft, who played for eight minor league teams and in two N.H.L. games, is now in Austria and planning his next steps.
snippet: Hugh Jessiman, the 12th pick of the 2003 draft, who played for eight minor league teams and in two N.H.L. games, is now in Austria and planning his next steps.
